messages: decc59fff71f0ea0665e0695a6122e36 (12:40): what is the best way of creating an application that is capable of creating/editing diagrams and mindmaps?

e4861610d329149fea4f7bfe65b0ab4f (13:23): How do set a fixed size for a QWidget? Setting QWidget::sizePolicy doesn't accomplish the task.
e9a0c3dd94d106ae82486687d7f5ddb8 (13:25): QMario: set both minimum and maximum to the same size ...
e4861610d329149fea4f7bfe65b0ab4f (13:26): I know that, but there has to be an easier way.
e9a0c3dd94d106ae82486687d7f5ddb8 (13:27): Has anyone tried out Qt Jambi yet?
e4861610d329149fea4f7bfe65b0ab4f (13:32): OS Indepence all the way!!! :)
e4861610d329149fea4f7bfe65b0ab4f (13:32): Even though python can do the same.
e9a0c3dd94d106ae82486687d7f5ddb8 (13:32): yes - but I don't know how well integrated pyQt is ...
e4861610d329149fea4f7bfe65b0ab4f (13:37): Are there any README examples using Qt4?
e4861610d329149fea4f7bfe65b0ab4f (13:42): Is it in Qt Assistant?
18ea04769bec1e3d4e3871f1e4e2beeb (13:43): do you mean an example of a readme file?
e4861610d329149fea4f7bfe65b0ab4f (13:49): An example of a graphical readme, such as gedit's readme.
ff0a1b32b57b24924f2d5141321cb965 (14:07): Hello.  How can I catch any "enter" pressed? In a child window I'd like to connect pressing enter the same as button accept().
